H0.text: In which year did Foinavon win the Grand National. 1955

H1.text: In which year did Foinavon win the Grand National. 1961

H3.text: In which year did Foinavon win the Grand National. 1967

A4.text: He won the Grand National in 1967 at odds of 100/1
